name: meadow sunset wrap
notes:
**size**
s/m (l/xl) 2xl/3xl 

**measurements**
length, approx: 250 (272) 299 cm / 98.4 (107.1) 117.7″ 
width, approx: 45 (48) 51 cm / 17.7 (18.9) 20.1″

**materials**
7 (7) 8 skeins of divina, color cardamom (09)
3 (3) 3 skeins of soft alpaca lace, color taupe (43)

the wrap is worked with 1 strand of each yarn quality held together.

**needles**
circular needle 5 (us 8) and 5.5 mm (us 9) – 40 cm (16″) 

**yarn quality**
divina, hobbii
65 % alpaca, 28 % polyamide, 7 % wool
50 g (1.75 oz) = 150 m (164 yds)

soft alpaca lace, hobbii
100 % alpaca
50 g (1.75 oz) = 400 m (437 yds)

**gauge** 
15 sts x 26 rows = 10 x 10 cm (4 x 4″) in stockinette stitch

**about the pattern**
the meadow sunset wrap is a combined knitted shawl and a sweater. it is meant to be wrapped around your body and has textured knitting and i-cord details. each end has a ribbing that functions as a sleeve. first, the first ribbing is worked, then stitches are increased for the shawl part of the work, before stitches are decreased and the last ribbing is worked.
